example.eg: Our neighbor brought cake as well as juice for everyone.
example.egtrans: 我们的邻居除蛋糕外还给各位带来了果汁。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 除…之外（也）, 与…（程度）一样

example.eg: William invited not only Sue to the party, but her sister as well.
example.egtrans: 威廉姆不仅邀请了苏参加派对，也邀请了她的姐姐。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 也，又, 同样地，完全有理由地, 还不如

example.eg: It's just as well I retired before they changed all the duties of my job.

dsense.name: might as well, may as well

example.eg: I might as well go with you.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最好, 不妨, 莫如

dsense.name: might as well, may as well

example.eg: It might as well be winter, with all this cold wet weather we're having.
example.egtrans: 我们这儿一天天的湿冷天气，就像身处冬季一般。
